snippet.title: Return (Dead Unicorn) // The Mini Indie Showcase 2023 Trailer
snippet.description:
Return to your home planet after 200 years of space travel in this atmospheric, art-driven adventure. Shoot, slash, and roll your way through dangerous enemies and ancient bosses, purchase items and unlock powerful weapons, and explore your unfamiliar home for parts to repair your ship.

Wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1537080/Return/

The Mini Indie Showcase 2023: https://youtu.be/ANsVkLxB3e0 

Learn more: https://sixoneindie.com/showcase
---------
Love indie games? Subscribe and hit the bell!
https://youtube.com/sixoneindie

Help us support the indie scene:
https://Patreon.com/SixOneIndie

Follow us on Twitter:
Six One Indie - https://www.twitter.com/SixOneIndie​

Six One Indie is an independently operated games organization dedicated to amplifying indie creators of all shapes and sizes.
